refnamediv.refpurpose: Enables or disables internal debug output

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: oci_internal_debug enables or disables internal debug output. Set onoff to 0 to turn debug output off or 1 to turn it on.

note.para: In PHP versions before 5.0.0 you must use ociinternaldebug instead. This name still can be used, it was left as alias of oci_internal_debug for downwards compatability. This, however, is deprecated and not recommended.
